p: Adaptations might include, for example, increased vigilance and preemptive changes in behavior against local extreme heat events for people with epilepsy due to heat‐sensitive mutation‐driven genetic epilepsies, informed by local (downscaled) modeling of future climate trends, or improved short‐term weather forecasting. As precision medicine initiatives become more popular, one could envisage inclusion of climate change parameters in individualized epilepsy management schemes.
